sections.description: Official PayToday payment gateway for WooCommerce using JavaScript SDK. Seamlessly integrate PayToday payments into your WooCommerce store with advanced features like tokenization, webhook handling, and WooCommerce Blocks support.
sections.changelog:
7.3.4

  • Added automatic update checking system using Plugin Update Checker library
  • Improved compliance with WordPress plugin standards
  • Enhanced error handling and logging
  • Added proper update URI in plugin header
  • Fixed version consistency across plugin files

7.3.0

  • Initial release with PayToday Web SDK integration
  • Supports PayToday payments for WooCommerce
  • Added WooCommerce Blocks support
  • Implemented webhook handling
  • Added tokenization support
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/paytoday-woocommerce directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the 'Plugins' menu in WordPress
  3. Go to WooCommerce > Settings > Payments and enable the PayToday payment gateway
  4. Configure your Shop Key, Shop Handle, and Private Key
sections.screenshots:
1. PayToday payment gateway settings in WooCommerce
  2. WooCommerce checkout page with PayToday as a payment method
  3. Successful payment redirect after processing
